gameReview: Love this game but it's starting to get stale. Need rotating and better maps. Can't wait for Warzone 2!

comments.commentText: Agreed about the map. At least the cheater situation is getting better.

gameReview: Best game out at the moment if you're playing with the right people!

comments.commentText: Definitely! Even if you're playing with randoms, if they're friendly and not toxic, it's still so fun!

gameReview: The game may be old but it's still the best of its kind years later.

comments.commentText: I've been waiting for SC3 for years...

gameReview: Join my clan! Clan number is 123456789!

comments.commentText: I've got a few friends that are interested!
